channel.title: How do i use a source?
channel.description: like i got gloryscape and it came without somethin to start up with so i put it on notebook to see if i could do somethin but i cant. how do i use it?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2007, 05:35:33 PM[/size][hr]bump

item.title: How do i use a source?
item.dc:creator: @mprules mprules
item.description:
@mprules wrote:

Well depends on what you want to do with it… Like do you want to start it and get on the server or do you want to add something to it? If you want to look for stuff to add to it go to the tutrial section.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2007, 06:28:56 PM[/size][hr]Link:http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,51.0.html

item.source: How do i use a source?

item.title: How do i use a source?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

dont bump. and… extract the rar/zip file, open the folder, click “runserver” its a batch file. then open mopar, leave the IP blank, and on runserver it will sya this in the black box “starting gloryscape server on ####:#.#.#.#” the first 4 is the PORT, the second for is the IP

Read full topic
